components: SERVICE BRAKES, HYDRAULIC,ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING
summary: I HAVE HAD MY ROTORS REGROUND NUMEROUS TIMES OVER THE PAST ONE AND A HALF YEARS AS WELL AS HAVE HAD BOTH BEARINGS REPLACED IN THE FRONT.  I HAD ALL VALVES REPLACED ON THE COOLANT SYSTEM AND IT CONTINUES TO LEAK STILL.  THERE IS A STRONG ODER THAT COMES IN THROUGH THE AIRCONDITIONING VENTS.   THERE IS ALSO A STRONG VIBRATION WHEN BRAKING OR TRAVELING AT HIGHER SPEEDS WHICH MAKES THE VEHICLE DIFFICULT TO CONTROL.*AK
